rationale: The eLTSS IG focuses on standardizing data exchange for Long-Term Services and Supports (LTSS) within the US Medicaid context, using FHIR R4 profiles and extensions. It aims to improve care coordination and efficiency for individuals receiving LTSS. This aligns it with Clinical Care (specifically General Clinical Care due to its focus on care coordination), the FHIR standard, US Realm, and primarily EHR-centric data.
